scripts.build: npm run clean && next build && npm run copy-public
scripts.copy-public: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); function copyDir(src, dest) { if (!fs.existsSync(dest)) fs.mkdirSync(dest, {recursive: true}); fs.readdirSync(src).forEach(f => { const srcPath = path.join(src, f); const destPath = path.join(dest, f); if (fs.lstatSync(srcPath).isDirectory()) { copyDir(srcPath, destPath); } else { fs.copyFileSync(srcPath, destPath); } }); } copyDir('public', 'out');"
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); if (fs.existsSync('out')) { fs.rmSync('out', { recursive: true, force: true }); }"
